name: Coffee Jamming
description:
GLOBAL GAME JAM 2020 Entry !

This is a prototype.

You'll need a computer with a keyboard, mouse and a gamepad in order to play.
We recommand you to try the game with a friend.

**Context**

You are in charge of making coffee in this special café. Combine different part in your coffee machine to have different soundtrack as you try minigames  that will help you make this cup of coffee ! 
This is a prototype. We planned on having machine part that would break over time, requiring players to switch machine part in order to maintain fully functional coffee machine. But for now you can just try the different puzzle and nothing will need to be repaired...

**Usefull Info**

There are three type of puzzles. Each meant to be use with one controller (mouse, keyboard, gamepad). We encourage you to try and test the puzzle and have fun with the music :D

A fix version will be upload soon.

A game made by :

Niels Jørgen Gommesen (@Gommezen) who made the musics & sounds for the game and brainstormed on game design

Cédrick Augustine who spent his jam on construct creating all the puzzles and brainstormed on game design and helped with assets 

Marianne Tondat (@Hanet0n) who made the graphics assets and brainstormed on game design
